dragon/CL:條|条[tiao2]/imperial
surname Long
to draw close to
to rope in/fig. to involve sb/to entice
to gather together
to crowd around
to draw together/to place side by side (e.g. one's fingers, two halves of a torn sheet of paper etc)
to close (flower, eyes, suitcase etc)/to bring together/(insect or bird when not flying) to fold (its wings)
to draw to oneself/to gather up/to collect/to fold up (an umbrella, wings etc)/to assemble (a party of persons)/to rope in (some people)

to gather/to assemble

sentences.english: Chickens also died from the lack of temperature control.
sentences.chinese: 擱有，雞仔因爲溫度箱峘無法度控制嘛攏死去。

sentences.english: A confluent small-pox had in all directions flowed over his face .
sentences.chinese: 天花打四面八方匯合攏來，佈滿了他整個臉孔。

sentences.english: Two big fish borders to the reverse direction to the spot, probably gather together 2 minutes.
sentences.chinese: 兩個大魚際向相反方向對斑，大約攏2分鐘。

sentences.english: We may not get any closer.
You just have to keep him on a tight leash.
sentences.chinese: 你要攏住他只須拉緊一根皮帶。

sentences.english: Nothing swaggered with a raucous noise to disarrange the perfect harmony.
sentences.chinese: 沒有任何東西以粗啞刺耳的嗓音攏亂這完美的和諧。

sentences.english: The green green oat grass cover the ground.
Cowardly as ever, I shifted my hair over my right shoulder to hide my face.
sentences.chinese: 我甚至怯懦到把頭髮攏到右肩上垂下來，擋住我的臉。

sentences.english: His hair was over his eyebrows and he pushed it back.
sentences.chinese: 他的頭髮蓋住了眉毛，他用手把他們攏向後面。

sentences.english: Twilight was closing on the diminished autumn day.
sentences.chinese: 秋日苦短，暮靄正在攏來。

sentences.english: They all moved towards the fire to get warm.
Taipei is the first round, the rabbit originally golden bell swings shook the Gospel.
sentences.chinese: 虎尾繫着金攏財氣，兔首搖着鈴蕩福音。

sentences.english: The cat was very angry. Every one of his whiskers stood up.
sentences.chinese: 貓是氣甲逐支嘴須攏翹翹翹。

sentences.english: Long in the chest with both hands, legs received heart, wrapped himself tightly.
sentences.chinese: 雙手攏在胸前，雙腿收到心口，把自己裹得緊緊的。

sentences.english: On the rock, there are three little tigers. They are all their children.
sentences.chinese: 石頭頂彼三隻細只的攏是怹的子。

sentences.english: She unsnipped the key brooch and clasped it in both hands.
sentences.chinese: 她脫下胸針，用雙手攏着。
